SEARCH
Package gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.links

Interface ResourceLinkMap

public interface ResourceLinkMap
The ResourceLinkMap represents an immutable set of ResourceLinkBuilders for a particular Resource type.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final ResourceLinkMap
    EMPTY_MAP
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JsonObject
    buildDetailLinks(RestResource resource)
    Builds all links.
    JsonObject
    buildSummaryLinks(RestResource resource)
    Builds the set of links that are not flagged with "DetailOnly."

  • Field Details

    • EMPTY_MAP

      static final ResourceLinkMap EMPTY_MAP

  • Method Details

    • buildDetailLinks

      JsonObject buildDetailLinks(RestResource resource)
      Builds all links.

    • buildSummaryLinks

      JsonObject buildSummaryLinks(RestResource resource)
      Builds the set of links that are not flagged with "DetailOnly." Currently, the "self" link and custom actions modeled as a post are included in summary links, but links to child resources are only included in the detail links.
